TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebEventFormatter extends System.Object

summary.span: 格式化 ASP.NET 健康監視事件資訊。

span.span: Formats ASP.NET health monitoring event information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 是使用一致的方式格式化事件的相關資訊，這非常有用，如果事件資料必須記錄，並向使用者顯示更新版本的支援類型...The is a supporting type used to uniformly format event-related information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user.. 執行個體類別會作為引數傳遞至健全狀況事件類型所定義的格式化方法。Instances of the class are passed as arguments to the formatting methods defined by the health-event types. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用格式事件資訊。The following code example shows how to use the to format event information. 它主要被要顯示使用正確的語法。It is mainly intended to show the correct syntax to use. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AppendLine(string s) cil managed

param.name: s
param.span: 要加入至事件資訊的字串。

span.span: The string to add to the event information.

summary.span: 將指定的字串和歸位字元 (Carriage Return) 附加至事件資訊。

span.span: Appends the specified string and a carriage return to the event information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您自訂的事件資訊加入您自己的特定事件的資料。The method allows you to customize the event information by adding your own event-specific data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int IndentationLevel { int get(); void set(int value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the indentation level.

value.span: 縮排層次使用的定位點數目。

span.span: The number of tabs used for the indentation level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您控制如何將事件資訊縮排。The property allows you to control how the event information is indented. 縮排的基本單位由定義屬性。The base unit of indentation is defined by the property. 針對每個縮排層級中，您可以增加縮排一個索引標籤。For each indentation level, you increase the indentation one tab. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int TabSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定定位點大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the tab size.
The number of spaces in a tab.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您控制寫入事件資訊時使用的定位點大小。The property allows you to control the tab size used when writing event information. 決定每個單位的縮排 所控制的空格數目屬性。The determines the number of spaces per unit of indentation, controlled by property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string ToString() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回字串格式的事件資訊。

span.span: Returns the event information in string format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用內部變數來儲存事件資訊。The uses an internal variable to store the event information. 這方法可讓您取得字串格式中的所有資訊。This method allows you to get all the information in a string format.
